patterns: What can we see in the DRT House?

responses: Diamante Reyes Transient House (DRT House) with Infinity Pool is a complete medium size house with a great mountain view. If you love nature, you will love to stay in the DRT house.
STAYCATION, PAHINGAHAN, FAMILY REUNION, BONDING RELAXATION AND NATURE for you and with your loved one or with the whole family, all available at DRT House!
DRT House with Infinity Pool is a small private resort that you can rent to stay with the beautiful mountain view of the Do√±a Remedios Trinidad (DRT).
DRT House with Infinity Pool is located at  Sitio Kutad, Tanawan St. Pulong Sampaloc DRT Bulacan. We are 5 mins away from Carribean Waves Waterpark Resort.
We are located at Sitio Kutad, Tanawan St. Pulong Sampaloc DRT Bulacan.  We are 5 mins away from Carribean Waves Waterpark Resort.

patterns: How many people can stay per room?
How many people can fit in your room?

How many people can stay in the Main House?
responses: We have one main house, one bahay kubo and two teepee houses. The Main House can fit 10 persons with the double deck bed, a queen size bed, L-shaped sofa, sofa-bed, and mattresses. We also have a one Bahay kubo with a terrace that can accommodate 3-5 people and two teepee houses that can accommodate 1-2 persons.

There is a main home, a bahay kubo, and two teepee houses. The double deck bed, queen size bed, L-shaped sofa, sofa-bed, and mattresses in the Main House can accommodate ten people. We also have two teepee houses that can accommodate 1-2 people and one Bahay kubo with a terrace that can accommodate 3-5 people.

One main house, one bahay kubo, and two teepee houses are available. With the double deck bed, a queen size bed, an L-shaped sofa, a sofa-bed, and mattresses, the Main House can sleep up to ten people. We also have one Bahay Kubo with a terrace that can sleep 3-5 people and two teepee houses that can sleep 1-2 people.

patterns: What is your Check-in and check-out time?
Can I adjust my check in time?
Can I extend my check out time?
How many hours is our stay?
How long can we stay in the DRT House?
responses: For all of our lovely guests, we have 22 hours to stay in our DRT House and our check-in time is 4:00 PM and the check-out time is 2:00 PM after the day of your check-in. This is strictly followed by all of our guests because we have daily guests and we need to follow the protocols and sanitize the DRT House for our next guest.

We have 22 hours to stay at our DRT House for all of our wonderful guests, with check-in at 4:00 PM and check-out at 2:00 PM on the day of your check-in. Because we have daily guests and need to follow the regulations and disinfect the DRT House for our next visitor, this is carefully followed by all of our guests.

responses: You can make your reservation by sending 2,000 Pesos in our GCash account and by confirming this transaction we confirm your information for your reservation. Our GCash number is 09326515696. Reservation fee is non-refundable if you cancel your booking.

You may reserve your booking by depositing 2,000 pesos into our GCash account, and by confirming this transaction, we will confirm your reservation details. 09326515696 is our GCash number. Reservation fee is non-refundable if you cancel your booking.
We have a reservation fee of 2,000 Pesos to confirm your booking on your specified date. Our GCash number is 09326515696. Reservation fee is non-refundable if you cancel your booking.

responses: DRT House has one main house with air conditioning, infinity pool, queen size bed, double deck bed, sofa bed, L-shape sofa, 32" flat screen tv, refrigerator, bluetooth speaker, gas stove, rice cooker, kettle, complete kitchen utensils, fresh linen and blankets, ihawan, and one Bahay Kubo that can accommodate 3-5 people and two teepee houses that can accommodate 1-3 people each.

We have one main house with air conditioning, infinity pool, queen size bed, double deck bed, sofa bed, L-shape sofa, 32" flat screen tv, refrigerator, audio system, gas stove, rice cooker, kettle, complete kitchen utensils, fresh linen and blankets, ihawan, and one Bahay Kubo that can accommodate 3-5 people and two teepee houses that can accommodate 1-3 people each.

DRT House has one main house with air conditioning, infinity pool, queen size bed, double deck bed, sofa bed, L-shape sofa, 32" flat screen tv, refrigerator, bluetooth speaker, gas stove, rice cooker, kettle, complete kitchen utensils, fresh linen and blankets, and ihawan, as well as one Bahay Kubo that can accommodate 3-5 people two teepee houses that can each accommodate 1-3 people.
We accept GCash for reservation and you can make the full payment of your reservation in the venue upon your check in. For complete payment, we take cash or GCash.

Reservations are accepted in GCash, and you may pay for your reservation in full when you arrive. For complete payment, we take cash or GCash.
We are open on weekdays and weekends with different rates. For reservations, you may contact us on 09326515696 or kindly message us on our Facebook page DRT House.
